SQL::TableInfo::AddIndex() Syntax Column_Number as N = .AddIndex( Index as SQL::IndexInfo ) ArgumentDescription Column_NumberThe column number of the new index column. A SQL::TableInfo object. A SQL::IndexInfo object.
Description The AddIndex() method adds a new index definition to a table definition. Names must not duplicate ("" counts as a name). Examples dim TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo dim IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo dim IndexColumn as SQL::IndexColumnInfo TableInfo.Name = "MyTable" IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" IndexInfo.PrimaryKey = .t. IndexColumn.Name = "MyColumnName" ? IndexInfo.AddColumn(IndexColumn) = .T. ? TableInfo.AddIndex(IndexInfo) = 1
See Also SQL::TableInfo Object Limitations
